meanings.definition: A person who warns or advises.
meanings.sent1: The teacher acted as an admonitor to the students.
meanings.sent2: An admonitor told us to be careful on the icy road.
meanings.sent3: My little brother thinks he is an admonitor when he tells me to do my homework.
meanings.sent4: In the story, the wise old man was the village admonitor.
meanings.sent5: The admonitor's words echoed in my mind as I faced the challenge.

meanings.sent1: She will admonitor her friend about the dangers of smoking.
meanings.sent2: Parents often admonitor their children to stay safe.
meanings.sent3: He likes to admonitor his dog not to chew on shoes.
meanings.sent4: The sign was put up to admonitor people about the wet floor.
meanings.sent5: Doctors admonitor patients to eat healthy and exercise.
